title: Block Party
tagline: Neighborhood bulletin board for buying, selling, and promoting
description: My team was tasked with creating a CRUD application using a SQL database.  We decided to create an app for neighborhood members to serve as both users and moderators of their own community forum.  Block Party features three distinct message boards: Karma Angles for offering goods/services, Choosy Beggars for requesting goods/services, and Nosey Neighbors for promoting events.  To accomplish this, we created three different tables within one database and used Handlebars.js to display users’ posts on individual pages.
role: I designed Blockparty's UI and developed the entire Frontend.

title: Reading Wishlist
tagline: Search engine for discovering and saving books
description: This application allows users to quickly search for books with the option to save them for future reference.  Users can choose from  a variety of search parameters including: title, author, topic, or keyword.  I used the GoogleBooks API to grab all books related to input and MongoDB to store saved data.

title: Friend Finder
tagline: Survey designed to connect people based on their personal values
description: This application asks ten questions with likert scales answer options to quantify and calculate a user’s values.  At the end of the survey, the user is shown whichever previous test taker matches closest to his/her scores.  To implement matchmaking, I used Express.js to get and post data from a server-side API.

title: Campwannagetajob
tagline: Collection of games created to sharpen critical thinking and job interview skills
description: For this project, my team was tasked with creating a MERN stack application.  We decided to create a series of brain-building games and technical interview related quizzes.  Each player’s game scores are displayed on a leaderboard, as well as posted to a user’s profile.
role: My main role was the group’s UI designer/Frontend Developer.  I used Adobe Illustrator to create the main logo each game icon.  Additionally, I also developed all technical interview quizzes (excluding Quiz Bowl) as well as a timed logical game.

title: Brews & Beats
tagline: Entertainment calendar made to ease the stress of planning a night out.
description: The goal for this project was to give users event and brewery options based on  the city, state, and/or timeframe entered.  This application was developed especially for travelers visiting unfamiliar cities.  OpenBreweryDB and Ticketmaster APIs were used to supply application data.
role: I served as my team's UI designer/developer.

title: Mongo News Scraper
tagline: Displays the latest in Music News and Commentary
description: This Application utilizes a web scraping button to display articles from the music world.  Users also have the option to save and comment on articles.  I used MongoDB to store saved articles and comments.
